thread.title: 20 Dresses to Wear When It’s Cold Out
thread.title_full: 20 Dresses to Wear When It’s Cold Out -- The Cut

author: Indya Brown
title: 20 Dresses to Wear When It’s Cold Out
text:
View Slideshow
Cold weather is rough, but since you do occasionally need to leave the apartment between November and March, we've found 20 long-sleeved dresses that will make you look pulled together even when you can't feel your toes. With so many options, you're covered no matter the day or occasion. Need to look polished for a big meeting? Slip on Theory’s wool dress or J.Crew’s versatile shift style for an outfit that’s as professional as it is effortless. Wishing it were socially acceptable to wear pajamas to work? Try a cozy caftan from & Other Stories or a flowing A-line number from COS. Click through to decide which dresses to buy now, and which to get on your next payday.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
